sen.j: 単式・島式の複合型2面3線のプラットホームを持つ地上駅。
sen.e: Goma Station is a stop on the ground which is compounded of two platforms (one side platform & one island platform) and three boardding areas.
sen.cmt: 「単式・島式の複合型2面3線のプラットホームを持つ」については、Wiki「プラットホーム」を参照し、「単式・島式の2つのプラットホームと３つの乗り場からなる」としました。またそう解すると「プラットホーム」と「乗り場（…番線）」は分けて訳す必要があるので、前者を platform 後者を boarding area としています。
sen.e: Goma Station is a ground level station with one side platform and one island platform serving three tracks.

sen.j: 駅舎はあるが無人駅となっており、駅舎内に自動券売機が設置されている。
sen.e: There exists a station building, but it becomes unmanned, so an automatic ticket machine is set inside the building.
There is a station building but, since it is unmanned, there is an automatic ticket machine inside the building.
There is a station building but, since it is unmanned, there is an automatic ticket machine inside the building.

sen.j: 駅舎に面した単式ホームが1番線で、島式の2・3番線へは跨線橋で連絡している。
sen.e: The side platform, or Boarding Area 1, faces the station building, and this platform is connected by a flyover with the island platform, or Boarding Area 2 & 3.
The side platform (track 1) adjoins the station building, and is connected by a bridge with the island platform (tracks 2 & 3).
The side platform (track 1) adjoins the station building, and is connected by a bridge with the island platform (tracks 2 & 3).

sen.j: 1番線が一線スルーとなっており、特急は全て1番線を通る。
sen.e: Boarding Area 1takes the system that keeps the speed of the nonstop train by limiting the train's running line to a single track, so all limited express services pass through Boarding Area 1.
sen.cmt: 「一線スルー」とは、「通過（スルー）する列車の走る線路を一線だけにすることで、その走行速度を保たせる方式」(Wiki 「一線スルー」参照。）のことで、それを'the system that keeps the speed of the nonstop train by limiting the train's running line to a single track'では表現しています。
sen.e: Track 1 serves as the main line when trains are crossing, so all limited express trains use this track.
Track 1 serves as the main line when trains are crossing, so all limited express trains use this track.

sen.j: 普通列車も行違いがない場合は1番線に入るが、前述した通り昼間時は当駅で特急通過待ち・行違いがあるため、1番線発着は朝と夕方以降のみに限られる。
sen.e: When the limited express service doesn't cross over, the local train service also goes into Boarding Area 1, but, as mentioned above, the local one has to wait for the faster one to pass through during the daytime, so it is just in the morning & in and after the evening that the local one can start from and arrive at Boarding Area 1.

When limited express trains are not passing, local trains also use track 1 but, as mentioned above, the station serves as a passing loop during the day, so this is only possible during the morning and evening.

When limited express trains are not passing, local trains also use track 1 but, as mentioned above, the station serves as a passing loop during the day, so this is only possible during the morning and evening.

sen.j: なお、園部方面からの折返し列車は、3番線で折り返す。
sen.e: In addition, the shuttle service train from the direction of Sonobe Station arrives at and starts from Boarding Area 3.
In addition, the shuttle service train to and from Sonobe Station arrives at, and departs from, track 3.
